name: ZEXAL - Xyz Evolution
text:
Activates at the beginning of your turn if your Life Points are at 2000 or below. Each of the following effects can be used once only.
● Place 1 "Xyz Change Tactics" face-up on your field. In addition, you can make your Life Points 2000.
● Return all "Utopia" monsters in your Graveyard to your Extra Deck.
